title: 92/164/EEC, Euratom: Commission Decision of 25 February 1992 authorizing Portugal to use statistics for years earlier than the last year but one and not to take into account certain categories of transactions or to use certain approximate estimates for the calculation of the VAT own resources base (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 25 February 1992  authorizing Portugal to use statistics for years earlier than the last year but one and not to take into account certain categories of transactions or to use certain approximate estimates for the  calculation of the VAT own resources base  (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)  (92/164/EEC, Euratom)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the breakdown by rate provided for in Article 4 (4) of Regulation (EEC, Euratom) No 1553/89, Portugal is authorized to use data from the national accounts relating to 1986 for the 1989 and 1990 financial years for which the VAT own  resources base has to be calculated.

For the purpose of calculating the VAT own resources base with effect from 1989, Portugal is authorized not to take into account the following category of transactions referred to in Annex F to the Sixth Directive:
- services supplied by authors, artists and performers (Annex F ex point 2).
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 February 1992. For the Commission
Peter SCHMIDHUBER
Member of the Commission
